clusterList.phrase: richard f syron chairman of freddie mac earned 14 5 million in 2007 including a 2 2 million performance bonus a company spokesman said the 2 2 million was only 66 percent of his targeted bonus of 3 34 million showing that the board of directors held syron accountable for the rough sledding at freddie mac freddie mac's stock dropped by about half in 2007 destroying billions in shareholder value

d aniel h mudd fannie mae president and chief executive saw his pay drop 15 percent last year according to the company's proxy still mudd received 14 2 million in 2007 including a 10 million direct stock award the drop in the fannie mae share price has resulted in a paper loss of nearly 66 percent of mudd's 10 million award his salary last year was 986 923 and he received 2 2 million in cash from a long-term incentive plan the board of directors in 2007 eliminated executive perks such as private jets for personal use financial services advice and a personal driver
